welcome_message_body: "Welcome to The Pinery, a charming city known for its beautiful landscapes and outdoor activities. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Arapahoe Co Airport provides check-in, baggage claim, and security services for all flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Arapahoe Co Airport caters to private jets and offers exclusive lounges and services for VIP travelers.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport with a simple sign-in process.

terminals.name: Jeppesen Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal of Denver International Airport, housing the check-in counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: One of the main concourses at Denver International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: One of the main concourses at Denver International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: One of the main concourses at Denver International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: One of the main concourses at Denver International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.
